document_data.mainbody:
Joiifericus was a succubus nursemaid serving the demon lord Grazzt in the late 15 century DR.
Joiifericus duty was to take care of the many half-demon children of Grazzt in Maerimydra circa 1486 DR. She would seek escape if attacked and would only fight if someone tried to abduct one of the children, but would not defend them.
Joiifericus enjoyed her work.
